channel.title: CVE Feed for mndpsingh287 -- File Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mndpsingh287 -- File Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-2654|2024-04-09T18:59:21.868Z -- mndpsingh287 -- file%20manager
item.description: The File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in all versions up to, and including, 7.2.5 via the fm_download_backup function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator access and above, to read the contents of arbitrary zip files on the server, which can contain sensitive information.
